Class AccountPostgresService

java.lang.Object
kp.services.AccountPostgresService
@ApplicationScoped public class AccountPostgresService extends Object
The service for the PostgreSQL database.

    • findAccount

      public Optional<AccountP> findAccount(String name)
      Finds the AccountP.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the AccountP

    • createAccount

      public Optional<AccountP> createAccount(AccountM accountM)
      Creates the AccountP from the AccountM.
      • AccountP is in PostgreSQL database.
      • AccountM is in MongoDB database.
      Parameters:
      accountM - the account with the source data
      Returns:
      the created new account

    • deleteAllAccounts

      public void deleteAllAccounts()
      Deletes all accounts in PostgreSQL database.
